text: Fangames are computer games created by fans based on popular video games. They are often made using C++, The Games Factory, Multimedia Fusion Express, and GameMaker. But now with free versions available of powerful game development tools available, some fangames are made in either Unity or Unreal Engine. == Other websites == * The Click Wiki - information about Multimedia Fusion, The Games Factory. Category:Video games
title: Fangame
